channel.title: Regulatory Risks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Regulatory Risks on FinanClub

item.title: BABA
item.description: score:1083 Chances: Alibaba Cloud releases open-source large language models (LLMs) to expand its influence in generative artificial intelligence. Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma to acquire a 10.3% stake in Ant Group from Alibaba, becoming the company’s largest shareholder. Alibaba introduces licensing requirement for businesses with over 100 million monthly active users to access its large language models (LLMs).

item.title: UPST
item.description: score:1139 Chances: Upstart, a consumer lender using AI for creditworthiness, experienced a significant stock rally, driven by a short squeeze, improving macro environment, AI excitement, and positive earnings report. Upstart’s Q2 2023 performance likely benefited from new product additions amid a challenging macro environment and support from funding partners.
